vote.title: To authorize the Director of Development to enter into a contract with the University District Special Improvement District of Columbus, Inc. for implementation of services as set forth in the Plan of Public Services and Improvements; to direct the City Auditor to appropriate and expend up to $400,000.00 from assessments levied from property owners in 2023; and to declare an emergency. ($400,000.00)
vote.description: A motion was made by Nicholas Bankston, seconded by Emmanuel V. Remy, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
